content.text:
jQuery15205571515532364115_1337474927749({"type":"video","version":"1.0","provider_name":"Vimeo","provider_url":"https://vimeo.com/","title":"MMShow 2012-0514","author_name":"ShortStreamTV","author_url":"https://vimeo.com/shortstreamtv","is_plus":"1","html":"<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/42131202" width="446" height="251" frameborder="0" webkitAllowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen allowFullScreen></iframe>","width":446,"height":251,"duration":549,"description":"Do you know anything about the "Cloud?" You know, as in "Cloud Computing." Well this past week, Dan dropped into the eCoast Cloud Summit and spoke to some of the organizers and speakers. Whether you realize it or not, you're already in the cloud. Have a look...

Coming up May 18th through the 20th is the 3rd annual Poocha Palooza hosted by our good friend Alyssa Duncan of Alyssa Duncan Photography. For a modest $25 session fee and a 30 lb bag of pet food, you get beautiful portrait of your best friend on four legs. To sign up, email alyssa [at] alyssaduncan [dot] com or call 603-373-0098.

Of course we have our regular cast of characters.

Featuring:
Dan Freund
Jeff Deck
Chuck Galle
Phil & MZ Kliger

With appearances by:
Salina McIntire
Brenden Flavin
Pete Leblanc
Nick VanBuskirk

...::.[ORP].::...","thumbnail_url":"https://secure-b.vimeocdn.com/ts/292/413/292413129_295.jpg","thumbnail_width":295,"thumbnail_height":166,"video_id":42131202})
